page.title: 03SOMERSHAM CHURCH
page.content: The church has only two bells.On the wall is a small cabinet,inside it is what looks like a bell but actually it is in fact a bomb which landed near the church in World WarI.The door to the church is very old,there are marks where once studs were.On the wall was a fragment of picture.There used to be pictures all around the church.There are two paintings,one of Moses and one of Arran. On the outside of the church is an old sundial which the vicar used to time his services by.The wood on the porch is very old and has been preserved in animals blood as it has salt in it.This vicar is also the vicar of Somersham,Flowton,Offton and Willisham churchs.He said he liked his job because he served God and he likes working with other people.This church was mentioned in the Domesday book.
